caption.title: Diagrammatic representation of the model.
caption.p:
Note: for the sake of clarity, inter-zone movement is indicated only for the susceptible animal compartment ( M
S ); it is identical for all other compartments. Also for the sake of clarity, compartments are only shown for human population ( H), domestic animal population ( M) and one vector species ( A); see Table 1 for a list of all compartments.
